description:
With this memory card game you can test and train your short-term memory or just play it for fun! You can even play it with someone else.

You have to collect sets of two identical images.
If all cards are removed the game is over.

New in this version: You can play memory with someone else. 

There are three levels: Easy, which has a gameboard of 4 x 4, Moderate, with a gameboard of 6 x 6 cards and Heavy with a gameboard of 8 x 8 (8 x 6 pixi) cards.
Every time you start a new game you switch between two sets of images which makes it more easy to play games after another. Otherwise your mind will mix-up card positions of the games you played before. 
When the game is over, your score will be shown. This is the average number of times you flicked a card.
With the button on the right-bottom you can switch between a light - or dark background color.
